channel.title: [Dedicated Host - Applications are Open - RS-PS]
channel.description:
[center][i][b][u]Hello fellow Moparians[/u][/b][/i] [/center]My name is Sean AKA Twins, I am from Israel (The Holy Land :) ), I am 25 years old. I am currently in my military service here in Israel. I lived in America for 10 years, in that 10 years I studied the follow things:
I am starting a development team which I want to be part of and not in charge of. I will do actions that involve of "being in charge" because I will have to, but I want to feel like all my other team mates in the manner of doing actions to get to the highest potential of a RS Project that can be.
I am really looking for having fun working together, I also want people that do not have any idea in Java or what ever to join, so they can learn from me and others.
[i][size=2em]What we have so far:[/size]
[/i] [ul][li][i][b]Professional Web Developer with a successful history in web-making.[/b][/i][/li] [li][i][b]Professional SEO guy that knows all the secrets of Google Search Engine.[/b][/i][/li] [li][i][b]Dedicated Host running 24/7[/b][/i][/li] [li][i][b]Any .com\.org domain we want.[/b][/i][/li][/ul] [size=2em] What we don't have:[/size]
[ul][li][i][b]Main Game Developer (a Java Guru).[/b][/i][/li] [li][i][b]Content Creators (Minor Java Guru).[/b][/i][/li] [li][i][b]Professional Graphics guy who I personally think that he is an amazing artist.[/b][/i][/li] [li][i][b]-PR people (PR= Public Relations, they are in charge of advertising the project all over.)[/b][/i][/li][/ul]
Applications are open for everyone. If you feel that you can contribute in any other way, feel free to contact me about it.
Feel free to contact me in skype: Shony.Arnon or my mail: [email]ShonyArnon@gmail.com[/email]
I will soon enough update this post with New, Updates, TDL, Screenshots and more so stay tuned. Thanks for reading and hopefully we will be working together.
, Sean
[size=0.7em][i]
P.S.: For those who are going to write here unneeded or unwanted comments - please dont. Comment if you have something positive or constructive to say - or of course you have any questions regarding certain features or factors that I did not talk about.[/i][/size]

Also, which Hyperion revision are you using?

item.title: [Dedicated Host - Applications are Open - RS-PS]
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

alexjerta:

Hello, I would be willing to join your dev team. I have no experience in Java but I am willing to learn. PM me it respond to this post if you want me on the team and I will add you. Have a nice day/night!

Hi Alexjerta,

please talk to me on skype, and we will see how you can contribute the most.

Skype: Shony.Arnon

Read full topic

item.title: [Dedicated Host - Applications are Open - RS-PS]
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

[quote=“Reminance, post:5, topic:534148”]Hey mate
I want to help you with your rsps.
I can contribute in being admin
Keeping it safe and whatnot.
Just decide whether you want me or not.[/quote]

Howdy Reminance,

in order to keep the game safe etc we need to have it published.
So I will save your name and when the game will go to beta stages will give you a heads up

Read full topic

item.title: [Dedicated Host - Applications are Open - RS-PS]
item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

I Roll Deep:

I’m accepting your offer I think iClarity would be a great base for the idea you have. It’s great to use, stabile, and it’s better then most bases. So I vote for iClarity

Hey Bro, talk to me on skype so we don’t overload this post

RS From The 00s:

I love iClarity also. Thanks for the offer, Sean, but already got commitments. I have a good feeling about you though. You seem to know the right stuff.

Thanks bro, you are always welcome to talk to me or get involved just say so

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @twins twins
item.description:
@twins wrote:

[center]Hello fellow Moparians
[/center]My name is Sean AKA Twins, I am from Israel (The Holy Land ), I am 25 years old. I am currently in my military service here in Israel. I lived in America for 10 years, in that 10 years I studied the follow things:

I am starting a development team which I want to be part of and not in charge of. I will do actions that involve of “being in charge” because I will have to, but I want to feel like all my other team mates in the manner of doing actions to get to the highest potential of a RS Project that can be.

I am really looking for having fun working together, I also want people that do not have any idea in Java or what ever to join, so they can learn from me and others.

[i][size=2em]What we have so far:[/size]

[/i]
[ul][li]Professional Web Developer with a successful history in web-making.[/li]
[li]Professional SEO guy that knows all the secrets of Google Search Engine.[/li]
[li]Dedicated Host running 24/7[/li]
[li]Any .com.org domain we want.[/li][/ul]
[size=2em]
What we don’t have:[/size]

[ul][li]Main Game Developer (a Java Guru).[/li]
[li]Content Creators (Minor Java Guru).[/li]
[li]Professional Graphics guy who I personally think that he is an amazing artist.[/li]
[li]-PR people (PR= Public Relations, they are in charge of advertising the project all over.)[/li][/ul]

Applications are open for everyone.
If you feel that you can contribute in any other way, feel free to contact me about it.

Feel free to contact me in skype: Shony.Arnon or my mail: ShonyArnon@gmail.com

I will soon enough update this post with New, Updates, TDL, Screenshots and more so stay tuned.
Thanks for reading and hopefully we will be working together.

Sean
